name: Die or Die (The Flamingo Games)
description:
SUBMISSION FOR GMTK2022

THEME : Roll Of A Dice 

HOW MY GAME APLIES : You play as a dice who gets a random weapon every time he does a combat roll. For each side of a dice you get  a weapon.

----------------------------------------

DESCRIPTION

A Dice fed-up that all the meeple and other game items get all the fun, while he is just thrown around. He takes his revenge.

Grab a weapon and when it's empty roll for a new one from the 6 possibilities. Survive as long as you can.

After a COMBAT ROLL you get a new weapon with a full clip, but the clipsize is different for each weapon

The Weapons

  • Deck Of Cards : 52 deadly cards with low damage, but high firerate
  • Pawn Rocket : 3 Slow moving rockets with medium damage on inpact, and explosion to damage nearby enemies
  • Pandemic Panic : 3 mine cubes, which explode into a deadly cloud (bug or feature?: Damages enemies even before explosion)
  • Poker Chip : Roll a big chip across the map and instakill every enemy in its way
  • Mr Black's Revenge : Even though he was killed in Cluedo, he  manages to give you 6 of his daggers  what you can throw across the map for medium damage. It goes through targets.
  • The Lost Marbles : Did you lost your marbles? Or you about to lose therm. Just throw these glass orbs at your closest enemies for a medium damage. You get 3 handfulls of 'em

----------------------------------------

IMPORTANT

The UI scaling is a mess, and you are not able to see the  current weapon's clip size. The game lacks of any kind of polish, but this is one of the most problematic issue currently, but sadly due the jam rules I won't be able to fix it.

Other known issues : 

  • Weapon info is not visible
  • Lack of Intro screen
  • Lack of Sounds
  • You have to wait a few seconds before you can activate the Poker Chip
  • Pandemic Panic Insta kills enemies which touch it before explosion
  • Overall lacking presentation

----------------------------------------

CONTROLS
WASD to move

SPACE to combat roll

Mouse to aim, and Right Click to shoot

Works with controller as well

Some weapons have auto fire. Some Don't
